DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to obtain images (pictures) of normal oral tissue, which occur inside the mouth, using a special camera. These pictures will be used in our research to evaluate a new technology that uses a laser and takes pictures of the microscopic structure of tissue. The technology is called "reflectance confocal microscopy."
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Testing of a Novel Endoscope for Reflectance Confocal Microscopy of Normal Oral Tissue In Vivo
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Ability to sign informed consent Age â‰¥ 18 years. Inability to give informed consent. Previously known oral disease
